name: In the Matter of Alvin J. ARNETT
docket_number: No. 121 Disciplinary Docket No. 3; Board File No. C1-95-15; Court of Appeals of Maryland, Misc. Docket (Subtitle BV); No. 34

parties: In the Matter of Alvin J. ARNETT.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 16th day of August, 1995, Alvin J. Arnett having been disbarred from the practice of law in the State of Maryland by Order of the Court of Appeals of Maryland dated December 20, 1994; the said Álvin J. Arnett having been directed on June 19,1995, to inform this Court of any claim he has that the imposition of the identical or comparable discipline in this Commonwealth would be unwarranted and the reasons therefor; and no response having been filed, it is
ORDERED that Alvin J. Arnett is disbarred from the practice of law in this Commonwealth, and he shall comply with all the provisions of Rule 217, Pa.R.D.E.
MONTEMURO, J., is sitting by designation.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
664 A.2d 1308
